name: Endless Balancer
description:
An endless wave of bugs come and harass you. how many can you defeat. 

first ever gamejame.

working on the jam was a blast, however gravely underestimated the amount of time and work to be done, not having a background in art or sound design this nipped me in the butt at the end as i was out of time to animate and add sounds. overall the jam gave me a good idea on what to do from now on. especially regarding the planning and not thinking about to big of an idea until my programming skills have had a bit of a polish.
